sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-table
    v-for="props in tbData"
    :key="props"
  >
    <el-table-column>
      {{ props.departmentName }}
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column v-for="shuju in props.children" :key="shuju">
      {{ shuju.departmentName }}
    </el-table-column>
  </el-table>
</template>
<script>
import { get } from '@/utils/request'
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      currentPage: 1, //默认页码为1
      pagesize: 10, //默认一页显示10条
      dialogVisible: false,
      dialogVisible1: false,
      info: {}, //修改数据
      info1: {}, //新增数据
      tbData: [],
      props:[]
    }
  },
  //初始化工作
  mounted() {
    get('/getAllDepartments').then((res) => {
      console.log(res)
      this.tbData = res.data
    })
  },
  methods: {}
}
</script>
